margaritas.name: Classic Margarita
margaritas.ingredients: 1 1/2 oz of tequila, 1/2 oz lime juice, 1 oz of simple syrup, ice
margaritas.directions: Place the tequila, simple syrup, and lime juice in a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake for 10 seconds, and then strain into a prepared cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime wedge if desired.

margaritas.name: Spicy Margarita
margaritas.ingredients: 1 1/2 oz of tequila, 1/2 oz lime juice, 1 oz of simple syrup, jalapeños, ice
margaritas.directions: Place the tequila, simple syrup, lime juice, and 1 to 2 slices of jalapeño in a cocktail. Using the muddler, mix ingredients well. Add ice to the coctail shaker and shake for 10 seconds, and then strain into a prepared cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime wedge if desired.
